name: ObscureFrontier
description:
Goblin Hero?

Follow a young goblin's journey through four various lands. He has been chosen by the gods to reclaim the legendary artifact known as the Tri-Power.

 Meet unique characters. 

Encounter strange enemies.

This adventure is not a walk in the park. Be prepared to die a lot. Lucky for our goblin protagonist, he has been blessed with infinite lives. Be careful though. One wrong move or mistake will send the goblin hero back to zero.

=====================================================================

Learn the controls

A/D keyboard movement

Left-Click to shoot magic

W (Interact) and F (Chug Potion) for anything interactable

Space for jump

=====================================================================

Some useful tips

Always keep moving. Obscure Frontier punishes the player for standing still.

Don't forget to buy from the shops. There are two located in the game's main hub. Be sure to pick up some potions. Be careful though, the shopkeeper can be a bit greedy.

If you find yourself making a long-distance jump. Be sure to jump again once reaching the ledge of where you want to go. You'll thank me later.

Dying is part of the experience. It makes you stronger. Literally. Collect orbs throughout the levels to upgrade your character stats.

=====================================================================

Credits

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com

Music obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
